(rightly, ಅಂತಾರಾಷ್ಟ್ರೀಯ ನಿಧಿ) an international organisation, established by the United Nations, to promote monetary cooperation, international trade, and exchange stability and to help equalise balance of payments by allowing members to draw from its fund; international monetary fund.
